titles.title: A resolution recognizing and celebrating the 225th anniversary of the entry of the State of Tennessee into the United States as the 16th State.
A resolution recognizing and celebrating the 225th anniversary of the entry of the State of Tennessee into the United States as the 16th State.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 225th anniversary of the entry of Tennessee into the United States as the 16th state.
